title: Am I only one that wishes that Trinity Force didn't exist?
body:
I feel like Trinity Force puts limitations on some champs' builds because it works in such a way that forces them to become dependent o the item.

For example: Hecarim can't be viable unless he buys this expensive item, and because of the huge power it provides him his Q has become nothing more than something you spam in order to get the TF procs.
